qas.question: What award did Spielberg receive on Jul 15, 2006?
Where was Spielberg honored on Dec 3, 2006?
Who narrated a short Spielberg bio at the Kennedy Center?
In what year did Jacques Chirac become president?
In what year was the Chicago International Film Festival first established?
In what year was Candide released?
In what year was the first Gold Hugo Lifetime Achievement Award first handed out?
Who was the first winner of the Gold Hugo Lifetime Achievement Award?

context: In <b4_0><b6_0><b7_0>2004<b7_0/><b6_0/><b4_0/> he was admitted as knight of the Légion d'honneur by president <a0_0>Jacques Chirac<a0_0/>. On July 15, <b5_0>2006<b5_0/>, <b8_0>Spielberg<b8_0/> was also awarded the <a1_0>Gold Hugo Lifetime Achievement Award<a1_0/> at the Summer Gala of the Chicago International Film Festival, and also was awarded a <a2_0>Kennedy Center<a2_0/> honour on December 3. The tribute to Spielberg featured a short, filmed biography narrated by <a3_0>Tom Hanks<a3_0/> and included thank-yous from World War II veterans for Saving Private Ryan, as well as a performance of the finale to Leonard Bernstein's Candide, conducted by John Williams (Spielberg's frequent composer).[citation needed]
